name: 侯劭毅
objective:
結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵
素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法
、產品之分離程序等。
schedule:
1st week: 課程簡介
2nd week: 細菌培養及bioreactor
3rd week: enzyme and enzyme kinetics
4th week: protein purification
5th week: metabolism and metabolic engineering 
6th week: nanotechnology 
7th week: contious bioreactor I
8th week: contious bioreactor II
9th week: 期中考
10th week: Genetic engineering I 
11th week: Genetic engineering II
12th week: Genetic engineering III
13th week: Lipid, Carbohydrate and their application
14th week: DNA chip & other biochip 
15th week: Tissue Engineering
16th week: Chromatography
17th week: Immunoassay
18th week: 期末考
